headline: HONEYWELL STUDY REVEALS MORE THAN 80% OF COMMERCIAL BUILDING MANAGERS PLAN TO INCREASE THE USE OF AI TO OPTIMIZE OPERATIONS
summary: Building managers are reporting the use of AI to help them enhance operational efficiencies with streamlined maintenance, upgraded security and optimized energy usageCHARLOTTE, N.C., Feb. 27, 2025...
